Bilateral conductive hearing losses.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

right stapedial fixation.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

otosclerosis.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

Bilateral progressive conductive hearing.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Bilateral progressive conductive hearing losses with probable otosclerosis.

probable otosclerosis.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Bilateral progressive conductive hearing losses with probable otosclerosis.

Endotracheal intubation.context: Endotracheal intubation carried out by Dr. X.

1% Xylocaine with epinephrine.context: Slow infiltration of the external canal accomplished with 1% Xylocaine with epinephrine.

incision.context: A limited incision was made in the earlobe harvesting a small bit of fat from the earlobe that was diced and the donor site closed with interrupted sutures of 5-0 nylon.

fat.context: A limited incision was made in the earlobe harvesting a small bit of fat from the earlobe that was diced and the donor site closed with interrupted sutures of 5-0 nylon.

mobility of malleus and incus.context: Palpation of the malleus revealed good mobility of both it and incus, but no movement of the stapes was identified.

no movement of the stapes.context: Palpation of the malleus revealed good mobility of both it and incus, but no movement of the stapes was identified.

hydrated nerve.context: The nerve was later hydrated with a small curved needle and an additional fluid to try to avoid inadvertent desiccation of it as well.

argon laser.context: The self-retaining speculum holder was used to get secure visibility and argon laser then used to create rosette on the posterior cruse.

fenestration.context: The fenestration created in the footplate was nearly perfect for placement of the piston and therefore additional laser vaporization was not required in this particular situation.

0.6 mm piston.context: A small bit of additional footplate was removed with a right angle hook to accommodate the 0.6 mm piston.

4.25 mm slim shaft wire Teflon piston.context: The measuring device was used and a 4.25 mm slim shaft wire Teflon piston chosen.

Gelfoam and antibiotic ointment.context: The external canal packed with small pledgets of Gelfoam and antibiotic ointment.
